base_description: Rectangular, white cabinet with two doors.
part_description: Two doors with handles, rectangular shape, side-by-side, covering the front. Flat top surface, enclosed back and sides, moderate size.
internal_interaction_description: The two doors are hinged on the sides, allowing them to swing open and closed. The handles facilitate easy gripping for access. Inside, there may be shelves or compartments for organization, allowing storage of various items.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a counter. It interacts with people who open the doors to access stored items. The flat top can hold other objects, such as decorative items or small appliances.
